text:
Roy Hudd, OBE (16 May 1936 – 15 March 2020) was an English comedian, actor, presenter, radio host, author and historian of music hall entertainment. His best known works were "The Blood Beast Terror", "Up the Chastity Belt" and "The Alf Garnett Saga".
Hudd died of a short-illness on 15 March 2020 at the age of 83.
